caption.p: Differences of local dimension in 4 × CO 2 and +4 K Atmospheric Model Intercomparison Project (AMIP) simulations. Differences of Δ d between average local dimension d SLP for daily sea-level pressure (SLP) data ( a, b) and d SST for monthly sea-surface temperature (SST) fields for the 4 × CO 2 and +4 K AMIP simulations with respect to the control runs. Error bars indicate the standard deviation of the mean. Lines: means of the ensembles, indicated in the legend by angular brackets
